entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is introduced as a character who is excited and has great experience in matters related to premonitions and apparitions. She is described as looking thoroughly excited and having great eyes that gaze at Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as the main character who has a scar and is being questioned by Professor Trelawney about his experience. He is described as lying to her and feeling shaken.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a character whose voice Harry heard sounding close behind him. He is not physically present in the scene but his presence is felt by Harry.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney questions Harry about what he saw, indicating that she is in a position of authority and seeking information from him.
Harry heard Voldemort's voice sounding close behind him, indicating a connection between the two characters.
